name: Cicada Technologies Inc.
description: Developer of a bond trading platform intended to bring efficiency, transparency, and fairness to the financial systems. The company's technology provides connectivity and access to bond securities in emerging markets, enabling investors to invest in bonds easily.
one_liner: Developer of a bond trading platform intended to bring efficiency, transparency, and fairness to the financial systems. The company's technology provides connectivity and access to bond securities in emerging markets, enabling investors to invest in bonds easily.
